<!-- source-hash: 06dbb63d69b1a5c3f8c5ed560635030d -->
Maps between internal event domain objects and external API response DTOs for event-related operations. Extends BaseRestMapper to provide common mapping functionality.

## Key Components

- **toEventResponse()** - Converts Event entity to EventResponse DTO
- **toEventResponseList()** - Maps collections of Event entities to EventResponse DTOs
- **toEventFilterResponse()** - Transforms EventFilters to EventFilterResponse DTO
- **toEventsResponse()** - Maps paginated query results to EventsResponse with page info
- **toEventFilterOptions()** - Converts filter criteria to internal EventFilterOptions

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private EventMapper eventMapper;

// Map single event
Event event = eventService.getEvent(eventId);
EventResponse response = eventMapper.toEventResponse(event);

// Map paginated results
GenericQueryResult<Event> queryResult = eventService.getEvents(pageRequest);
EventsResponse eventsResponse = eventMapper.toEventsResponse(queryResult);

// Convert filter criteria
EventFilterCriteria criteria = new EventFilterCriteria();
criteria.setUserIds(Arrays.asList("user1", "user2"));
EventFilterOptions options = eventMapper.toEventFilterOptions(criteria);
```
